The music of Macedonia is the music of the Greek geographic region of Macedonia, which is a part of the music of whole region of Macedonia. Folk dances in Macedonia include the Makedonia, hasapiko, leventikos, zeibekiko, zonaradiko, endeka Kozanis, samarinas, stankena, akritikos, baidouska, Macedonikos antikristos, mikri Eleni, partalos, kleftikos Makedonikos, mpougatsas, kastorianos, tromakton, o Nikolos, antikrystos, sirtos Macedonias and Kapitan Louka. There are also folk songs which make references to the Macedonian Struggle, while it is notable the use of trumpets and koudounia.

Overview[edit]

See also: Music of Greece

Folk dances in the Macedonian region of Greece include:

  • Akritikos
  • Baidouska
  • Endeka Kozanis
  • Kastorianos
  • Leventikos
  • Makedonia (dance)
  • Makedonikos antikristos
  • Mikri Eleni
  • O Nikolos
  • Partalos
  • Proskinitos
  • Syrtos
  • Zacharoula
